title: Book Reading Tracker
description: A web application to track reading habits using Next.js, PostgreSQL, and Prisma.

title: Food Catering Service
description: A platform for managing food orders and deliveries for parties and events.

title: E-commerce Barcode Scanner
description: A Vue.js application with barcode scanning functionality for inventory management.

title: Naturalization Test Prep
description: A web application to help users prepare for the Japanese naturalization test.

title: Historical Places Guide
description: A website showcasing historical places and sea beaches in Kamakura, Japan.

title: YouTube Thumbnail Generator
description: A tool to create YouTube thumbnails using DALL-E and other image processing techniques.

title: Kids eBook Creation
description: An application to create and publish children's ebooks with illustrations and interactive elements.

title: Printable Activities Marketplace
description: A platform to create and sell printable activities, study guides, and language learning resources.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A minimalist personal portfolio website with sections for projects, blog, and contact.

title: Microservices Architecture Demo
description: A demonstration of microservices architecture using Docker, Nginx, Next.js, and MySQL.
